page.title: 05Restoring the Water Gardens
page.content: { The National Trust}is hoping to return the water garden at{Fountains {Abbey}to its original state.The work will take many years to complete and the Trust will make efforts to keep it as it should be.They have made a start on the area near to the Mirror Pond. The Mirror Pond reflects its surroundings and gives the idea that you can see more than there actually is. Neptune is a lead statue in the middle of this pond.He has been taken away to be restored.He was cut into smaller pieces because it was too big to be carried on a boat across the pond. { The River Skell}has been straightened throughout the park. This canal is in need of some work. The banks are collapsing and are wearing away.
